TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Pisirian, title = Pisirian, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pisirian} }

S.FORM: Pisirian Itiniay i Chenggong Cen no Taitung ko Pisirian a niyaro', 418 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,054 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 70% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 733 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 30% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 321 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 64%, Puyuma 1%, roma 5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. O katadamaanan no niyaro'

Pisirian Itiniay i Chenggong Cen no Taitong ko Pisirian a niyaro', 418 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,054 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 70% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 733 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 30% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 321 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 64%, Poyoma 1%, roma 5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. O katadamaanan no niyaro'
